tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_roles (
  role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE role_privileges (
  privilege_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  privilege_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  role_id INT REFERENCES meeting_roles(role_id),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_date DATE,
    moderator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (moderator_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RolePrivileges (
    role_id INT,
    privilege_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (role_id, privilege_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES Roles(role_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (privilege_id) REFERENCES Privileges(privilege_id)
);
